channel.title: CVE Feed for Liblouis -- all

item.title: CVE-2017-15101|2024-08-05T19:50:16.378Z -- liblouis -- liblouis
item.description: A missing patch for a stack-based buffer overflow in findTable() was found in Red Hat version of liblouis before 2.5.4. An attacker could cause a denial of service condition or potentially even arbitrary code execution.
